professional_summary: Experienced IT professional with expertise in Microsoft SQL Server, Oracle, and various other technologies. Strong focus on database administration, data integration, and system optimization.

key_responsibilities: Administering and optimizing SQL Server databases to ensure performance and reliability.
Implementing backup and recovery strategies to safeguard data integrity.
Monitoring and controlling user privileges to maintain security policies.
Upgrading and migrating databases from SQL Server 2000 to 2008
including user management and privilege control.
Designing and implementing ETL processes for data integration between OLTP and OLAP systems using SSIS.
Resolving issues related to database migrations and version conflicts.
Integrating SQL Server security with enterprise-level authentication systems and maintaining monitoring standards.
Designing high-level ETL architectures for data transfer from OLTP to OLAP using SSIS.
Converting stored procedure-based reports in SSRS to improve efficiency.

tools_and_software:
RedGate",
            "Idera Access",
